title: Adults attending a classical music event in the past 12 months in the U.S. 1982 to 2012
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of adults, containing a total of 5 data points.
In general Share of adults has fallen over the Year.
Share of adults is roughly constant from 1982 to 1992, gradually decreasing from 1992 to 2008, and lastly roughly constant from 2008 to 2012.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2002 and 2008.
Maximum Share of adults, about 13.0 was reported at Year 1982
Minimum Share of adults about 8.8 was reached at Year 2012
